name: iFaceRecognition
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
### [By YuliWANG](wangyul7@mail3.sysu.edu.cn)
This is A project for a application of Face Recognizing based on Android.
For this Application,we have three activities,of which one for the MainPage,one for test,and a third one for real-time tracking and recognizing human faces.
For more details,read the[documents](http://repstd.github.io/iFaceRecognitionDocs/html/)


### Features
1. Implement the algorithm of detecting and Recognizing faces using both EigenFace and FisherFace with the help of OpenCV.
2. Capable of detecting the positoin of eye corner and iris center accurately,the goal of wich is achived with properly calculated binarization.
![fig-1 MainPage](http://repstd.github.io/iFaceRecognitionDocs/fig-1.bmp)
![](http://repstd.github.io/iFaceRecognitionDocs/fig-2.bmp)
![](http://repstd.github.io/iFaceRecognitionDocs/fig-3.bmp)
